title: "How can concentration exercises enhance our presence and awareness?"
first_phrase: This text presents a series of exercises aimed at developing concentration and presence of mind. These exercises range from focusing exclusively on a single noise to counting the grains of a necklace without thinking of anything else. The final 200 tokens introduce Exercise 21, which focuses on counting objects without actually counting them in order to unite the mind's foreground and background. Through these exercises, the text aims to help readers cultivate a sense of presence that can be applied to everyday life, enabling them to better focus and connect with their surroundings.

last_phrase: In conclusion, these exercises are a great way to increase your presence and sensitivity. By practicing them daily, you can improve your ability to observe without counting, integrate your sub-sensorialties, and develop a stronger sense of unity between your body and mind. Additionally, the hot water/cold water exercise can help you overcome polarities and build your own reality.
